data.eml:eml: Two new species of Colubotelson Nicholls, 1944 in Tasmania's Lake Pedder: persistence of Phreatoicidae (Crustacea, Isopoda) in therein

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wilson, George D. F. (2012): Two new species of Colubotelson Nicholls, 1944 in Tasmania's Lake Pedder: persistence of Phreatoicidae (Crustacea, Isopoda) in therein. Zootaxa 3406: 1-29, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210681
